api.gbuild.component.button

Class GButtonClose

  • java.lang.Object
    • api.gbuild.component.GComponent
      • api.gbuild.component.button.GButton
        • api.gbuild.component.button.GButtonClose

  • public class GButtonClose
extends GButton

    Button with the shape of a close button

    This button is a set of components that formed an square rectangle with an x inside it that should be associated to an event for closing the component.

    Author:
    David Parre√±o Barbuzano

      • draw

        public void draw()
        Description copied from class: GComponent
        Draw component on the screen

        This method would drawn the component taking into account all the customization done before.

        It is important to notice that component would not be drawn if visible state is not true.
